message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $14,000.  I believe this product will be highly valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,500 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,500. This offer reflects the true value of the product.
I understand that $13,500 is still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. Can we try $13,000?
